casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Salyer, Appellant, v. Ohio Bureau of Workers’ Compensation, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Salyer v. Ohio Bur. of Workers’ Comp. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 387.]

(No. 96-1999 Submitted July 8, 1998 Decided October 14, 1998.) Stewart Jaffy & Associates Co., L.P.A, Stewart R. Jaffy and Marc J. Jaffy, for appellant. *388Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Dennis L. Hufstader, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the writ is granted.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent. Lundberg Stratton, J.,

dissenting. I would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C. J., and Cook, J., concur in the foregoing dissenting opinion.
